name: The Lesser Evil (FeatureKreep)
description:
The Lesser Evil is a mouse-only sacrifice simulator where you need to find a villager that matches the fancy of your eldritch overlords and feed the poor fool to them.

Made for the Spooktober Jam 2021 (theme: Sacrifice)

Credits

Art & gameplay: @FeatureKreep

Music: Meat Automaton

Want to support me? You can donate to my Ko-fi ☕
